hero.headline: Power You Can
hero.description: Licensed electricians serving {{city}} with safe, reliable electrical work. From panel upgrades to full rewiring, {{businessName}} does it right — every time.

items.label: Safety First

processSection.headline: How It Works
processSection.description: Getting professional electrical service in {{city}} is easy.

steps.title: Call or Book Online
steps.description: Reach out and tell us what you need. We respond fast.

steps.title: Free Assessment
steps.description: Our licensed electrician evaluates your situation on-site.

steps.title: Expert Service
steps.description: We complete the job safely and to code, with upfront pricing and no surprises.

steps.title: Your Satisfaction
steps.description: We follow up to make sure everything works perfectly, backed by our {{warrantyYears}}-year warranty.

aboutSection.description: {{businessName}} has been serving {{city}} and the {{region}} since {{establishedYear}}. With {{reviewCount}}+ five-star reviews and a team of licensed, certified electricians, we deliver electrical services you can count on. Our commitment to safety, quality workmanship, and honest pricing has made us one of {{city}}'s most trusted electrical companies.
aboutSection.mission: To provide {{city}} homeowners with safe, reliable, and professional electrical services.

values.title: Quality Work

values.title: Customer First
